labels.name: P4, unlikely to ever be fixed.

data.actual_result: Icons are different in both the cases
data.expected_result: The mic and headphone icon should be same in both the cases (either backslash or slash symbol running across the mic and headphone icon)
data.short_description: The mute/deafen icon shown when you joining a vc are different from when you click on channel name to view full screen voice channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel, mute and deafen yourself. - Notice that the backslash symbol over the mic and headphone icon when you see the voice channel without going into it - Now go to voice channel screen by clicking the channel name and notice that the slash symbol over the mic and headphone icon
